tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fuel_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  fuel_type VARCHAR(50),
  fuel_quantity DECIMAL(10,2),
  fuel_cost DECIMAL(10,2),
  report_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE fuel_consumption (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT,
  fuel_amount DECIMAL,
  distance_travelled DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE cost_report (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  fuel_cost DECIMAL,
  maintenance_cost DECIMAL,
  total_cost DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_name VARCHAR(50),
  vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
  fuel_capacity DECIMAL,
  max_speed INT
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  brand TEXT,
  model TEXT,
  year INT,
  fuel_capacity DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE driver (
  driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  age INT,
  license_number TEXT,
  vehicle_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE report (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  vehicle_id INT,
  distance_traveled DECIMAL,
  fuel_consumed DECIMAL
);
